answers.answer: Yes Zyprexa is an antipsychotic and also fda approved as a mood stabilizer and within a doctor's discretion can be use for other purposes as well. However, although each person responds differently to each medication it is the antipsychotic the most likely to cause weight gain so it would be worthwhile to ask your psychiatrist why they feel this specific medication would be more beneficial than others in its class as its best to know the reasons. Besides proper diet and exercise which if the weight gain is more than minor it might be worthwhile to obtain a referral to a nutritionist, for weight gain caused by medications in this class for some people the medication Metformin has been of help in this regard so you could ask your doctor if this is an option and if not what else might be of help.
